1. TRL to immediately generate ADM AGENT rpt once
0xc104010f050505030102030400000000010101010e01c104010a020501880301000100

2. Define COmputed Data 0403010203 as # Run TRL + # CTRLS RUN
0x0185aea68529580001c1040102030504030102030d03800101038001010b830701000102

3. SRL IF(# SRL > # TRL) THEN generate full ADM report 1 time.
0xc104011305040502010204000000000d0380010104800101028307010f01010e01c104010a020501880301000100

4. Define Report R1 (0x38010301020301) to be {# Rules, #TRL, #SRL}
0xc10401060207380103010203010d03840201008001010280010104

5. Define Macro M1 (0x39010301020201) to be {C1, C2, C1} where
  C1 is generate report R1 (0x38010301020301) and send it to
  ipn:1.1 (0x69706e3a312e31).
  C2 is delete SRL (0x35010301020001)

0xc104010b0305045465737407390103010202013f03c104010a0208013801030102030109010769706e3a312e31c104011401080135010301020001c104010a0208013801030102030109010769706e3a312e31

6. Define SRL to run M1 if # rules > 10
0xc10401130507350103010200010400000000100384020100c205010201010a8307010f0101080139010301020201

7. Same as 6, except > 1 not > 10.
0xc10401130507350103010200010400000000100384020100c20501020101018307010f0101080139010301020201

8. Same as 7 with different MID.
0xc10401130507350103010200020400000000100384020100c20501020101018307010f0101080139010301020201
